page.title: 01Major Local Industry
page.content: Hedon Growers is a large horticultural industry in our area.They have 18 blocks of glasshouses that grow cucumbers.The area of Hedon Growers is 21 and a half acres.Hedon Growers has a grading area and a special area for cutting cucumbers in half.Before they go to the grading area and the special area,men cut the cucumbers from the plants.After they take them across to the grading area,where they shrinkwrap them and put them into boxes.Some of the cucumbers are sent to the supermarkets and others are for the special area.In the special area they chop the cucumbers in half then they put them into bags.After that they stack them into brown crates then into the lorries at East Coast Salads.{
